name: SABERTOOTH
description:
SABERTOOTH - The survivor

This is a survival game where you, as the main character baby beetle, have to eat leaves while you survive from the dangerous spiders. When you get enought food you can escape through a tunel. Try to survive in a record time !!

Controls

Move with ARROW KEYS

Development

A videogame made in Phaser3

This is just the first phase, I will continue updating the game and adding more levels until it becomes an amazing 2d dungeon game! 

You can find it on Github and read more information and its credits.
